Package com.bluegosling.reflect.caster

An API that leverages reflection to dynamically cast an object to an arbitrary interface.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Converter<I,O>
    Converts a value from one form to another, possibly with the aid of a Caster.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Caster<T>
    An object that can cast objects to arbitrary interfaces.
    Caster.Builder<T>
    A builder of Casters.
    DispatchSettings
    Settings related to dispatch of interface methods when using a Caster.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DispatchSettings.Visibility
    A level of method visibility, for example public, private, etc.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AmbiguousMethodException  

Package com.bluegosling.reflect.caster Description

An API that leverages reflection to dynamically cast an object to an arbitrary interface. The object does not need to have been declared to implement the interface as long as it is structurally compatible (or at least partially compatible). Dispatch is handled via reflection. This allows casting private API of an object as a public interface and even enables general dynamic dispatch (though, admittedly, inefficiently).
